Text:
Rip is definitely very good. But no one will be able to play this movie except VLC player.I tried with S-Player and WMP backed with Shark Codec. All were failures. Its a screwed up greenish distorted image. Only and only VLC media player can play it on my lappy.
For VLC play, A/V: 10/10....
why would you use anything but vlc anyways
